messages.title: THE FUTURE
messages.content: Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve. A Liberal Democrat government will build a country where every single person and community is valued, empowered and cared for.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will end the Brexit mess, and protect our planet for future generations.

issues.environment: protect our planet for future generations

contactInformation.address: Unit 6, Crags Court Business Park, Barton Lane, Abingdon, OX14 3NB

quotes.text: Both Tories and Labour have failed the country
British politics is falling apart – the Tories are to blame, but Labour is also a shambles

images.caption: Alistair Fernie with supporters and Jo Swinson's image, promoting the message 'Stop Brexit. Build a Brighter Future'

leaflet.additionalNotes: Sign up to be among the first to see our full Plan for the Future at www.libdems.org.uk/plan
